name: mac-cleaner
description: macOS System Cleaner - Clean junk files and free up disk space

scripts.electron:dev: tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.ts dist/electron/preload.js && cp electron/preload-status.js dist/electron/preload-status.js && cp dist/electron/electron/main.js dist/electron/main.js && cp dist/electron/electron/game-handlers.js dist/electron/game-handlers.js && cp dist/electron/electron/diagnostic-handlers.js dist/electron/diagnostic-handlers.js && cp dist/electron/electron/transfer-handler.js dist/electron/transfer-handler.js && cp dist/electron/electron/transfer-state.js dist/electron/transfer-state.js && ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE= electron .
scripts.electron:build: tsc && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.ts dist/electron/preload.js && cp electron/preload-status.js dist/electron/preload-status.js && cp dist/electron/electron/main.js dist/electron/main.js && cp dist/electron/electron/game-handlers.js dist/electron/game-handlers.js && cp dist/electron/electron/diagnostic-handlers.js dist/electron/diagnostic-handlers.js && cp dist/electron/electron/transfer-handler.js dist/electron/transfer-handler.js && cp dist/electron/electron/transfer-state.js dist/electron/transfer-state.js && npm run electron:build:arm64
scripts.electron:build:dir: tsc && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.ts dist/electron/preload.js && cp electron/preload-status.js dist/electron/preload-status.js && cp dist/electron/electron/main.js dist/electron/main.js && cp dist/electron/electron/game-handlers.js dist/electron/game-handlers.js && cp dist/electron/electron/diagnostic-handlers.js dist/electron/diagnostic-handlers.js && cp dist/electron/electron/transfer-handler.js dist/electron/transfer-handler.js && cp dist/electron/electron/transfer-state.js dist/electron/transfer-state.js && npm run electron:build:arm64:dir
